trans-unit.source: Indicates that a method is invoked by a condition.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en annen metode kalles med en betingelse.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to support a forward chaining model that will cause the reevaluation of rules based on state change.
trans-unit.target: Dette attributtet brukes til å støtte en Videresend kjede modell som vil føre til at ny vurdering for regler som er basert på endring av databasetilstand.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadAttribute>, RuleInvokeAttribute, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute> classes each indicate the properties used to read a condition, write an action, and invoke a method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadAttribute>, RuleInvokeAttribute, og <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute>klasser hver angi egenskaper som brukes til å lese en betingelse, skrive en handling og starte en metode.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadAttribute>

trans-unit.source: These attributes enable the workflow to only reevaluate rules that will change the final output.
trans-unit.target: Disse attributtene aktivere arbeidsflyten skal reevaluate bare regler som endrer den endelige utskriften.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleInvokeAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleInvokeAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The method invoked by the rule.
Gets the method invoked by the condition.
The method invoked by the condition.
